android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

com.nordvpn.android.permission.C2D_MESSA.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Service (com.evernote.android.job.gcm.PlatformGcmService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.android.gms.permission.BIND_NETWORK_TASK_SERVICE
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.nordvpn.android.main.ControlActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title: TaskAffinity is set for Activity </br>(com.nordvpn.android.deepLinks.DeepLinkDisconnectActivity)
manifest_analysis.desc: If taskAffinity is set, then other application could read the Intents sent to Activities belonging to another task. Always use the default setting keeping the affinity as the package name in order to prevent sensitive information inside sent or received Intents from being read by another application.
manifest_analysis.name: TaskAffinity is set for Activity

playstore_details.title: NordVPN: Best VPN Fast, Secure & Unlimited
playstore_details.description:
Looking for the best VPN for Android? The NordVPN app lets you enjoy secure and private internet access in just a single tap – on your smartphone, tablet, or your Android TV.

PCMag Editors’ Choice and recommended by CNET, NordVPN is the No. 1 VPN service for more than 12 millions users worldwide. Now that’s a very private club. Join now!

Enjoy REAL internet privacy
It’s nobody’s business what websites you visit or what files you download. NordVPN keeps your online activity private from ISPs, advertisers, and other snoopers.

Protect your sensitive data
We secure your internet traffic with military-grade encryption so that no one can get their hands on your online data.

Browse the web from a different region
NordVPN changes your IP address so that you appear to be browsing from a different location. We have servers in 60 countries – travel virtually to any of them in seconds.

Stay safe on Wi-Fi
Hop on any Wi-Fi network without the risk of your sensitive data being exposed. Connect to VPN and enjoy free Wi-Fi securely – at an airport, a coffee shop, a train station... You name it.

Shield yourself from cyber threats
The CyberSec feature protects you from accessing dangerous websites that host malware, spyware, and other malicious software. Also, CyberSec makes sure that your device doesn’t join a botnet zombie army. 

Stream at full speed securely
Buffering can be the ultimate buzzkill. But not with NordVPN! We offer more than 5700+ servers worldwide so you can enjoy fast and stable connection anywhere.

Connect automatically
Set VPN to auto-connect on Wi-Fi, on cellular data, or stay connected to VPN online at all times. Simply flip a switch and forget about it – being secure online has never been easier.

MORE FEATURES:

✔ Protection for 6 devices with a single account
✔ Award-winning 24/7 customer support 
✔ 5700+ servers in 60 countries
✔ Ultra-fast servers for P2P sharing
✔ Double VPN for double encryption
✔ No-log policy: we’ve completed a third-party audit to prove it. 

NordVPN makes cybersecurity as easy as it gets – from VPN download to connecting. 

Start your 7-day free trial today.
playstore_details.summary: Our birthday, your gift! Buy the 3Y plan and get an extra subscription on top!
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Our birthday, your gift! Buy the 3Y plan and get an extra subscription on top!
playstore_details.developerAddress: Aquilino de la Guardia Street No. 8, Panama City, Panama
playstore_details.recentChanges:
* Local network access: switch it on to be visible and to access other devices (computers, printers, TVs – you name it) on LAN. Switch it off to put the invisibility cloak back on.
* The one for extra safety: now, you can connect and disconnect from a VPN using the Quick Settings Tile only when your phone is unlocked.
* You say ‘bug’, we say ‘fixes’. We’ve defeated a bunch of these sneaky creatures to make your app experience smoother.
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML:
* Local network access: switch it on to be visible and to access other devices (computers, printers, TVs – you name it) on LAN. Switch it off to put the invisibility cloak back on.
* The one for extra safety: now, you can connect and disconnect from a VPN using the Quick Settings Tile only when your phone is unlocked.
* You say ‘bug’, we say ‘fixes’. We’ve defeated a bunch of these sneaky creatures to make your app experience smoother.
